programme.title: Qari Cilik Season 2 Ep16
programme.desc: Musim kedua program pencarian bakat untuk menghafal al-Quran bagi kanak-kanak sehingga berusia 14 tahun kini kembali. Ikuti musim ini untuk menyaksikan bakat-bakat muda yang hebat dalam dunia penghafalan al-Quran.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep44
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Dunia Berhenti Mengejar Cintamu
programme.desc: Siapa sangka orang yang dimarahi Bella tadi adalah Tama, bos di tempat kerja barunya? Bella sampai bingung dan gugup semasa bertemu Tama lagi di pejabat.

programme.title: Indonesian Dangdut Awards 2021 Top Nomination Ep2
programme.desc: Acara Anugerah Dangdut Indonesia (IDA) merupakan anugerah tahunan untuk penyanyi dangdut paling berjaya dan terkenal di Indonesia.

programme.title: The Lost Choices
programme.desc: A young woman who has speech disorder is raped while on her way home. The police do not believe in her. She is frustrated and thus triggers her silent revenge against the world.

programme.title: Cassiopeia
programme.desc: Soo-Jin is a successful lawyer and loving mother who tries to live a fulfilling life after her divorce, but things start to fall apart when she is diagnosed with Alzheimer's after a car accident.

programme.title: The Attorney
programme.desc: When tax attorney Song Woo-Suk agrees to defend a student activist who was arrested and tortured into giving a false confession, his entire life and worldview begin to change drastically.

programme.title: Sleep
programme.desc: A man turns into a different person in sleep every night ever since he murmurs something strange, bringing fear and danger to his wife and their soon-to-be-born child...

programme.title: The Boys
programme.desc: 3 boys were imprisoned as murderers. Next year, detective Hwang got a tip and reopen the case. However, he was demoted. 16 years later, the only witness and the boys return to find Hwang.

programme.title: Voice Of A Murderer
programme.desc: The only son of a news anchor disappears without a trace. There is a veteran cop and his special task force assigned to this case, but there is an indication the kidnapper is aware of their presence.

programme.title: Hot Young Bloods
programme.desc: In a rural town in 1982, a tough young girl secretly has a crush on a playboy. When a transfer student arrives, the playboy falls in love with her causing unexpected chaos at school.

programme.title: Hello Ghost
programme.desc: A man has many failed suicide attempts. After the most recent one, he discovers he can see a family of ghosts. The ghosts agree to leave him alone under the condition that he fulfill their requests.

programme.title: Pipeline
programme.desc: A team of experts were put together to drill into Koreas oil pipeline and steal petroleum, but the plan takes a turn as the group begin to deceive one another

programme.title: Love 911
programme.desc: A doctor tries to woo a grieving, widowed firefighter in her attempt to get him to testify on her behalf in a medical malpractice case.

programme.title: Yoga
programme.desc: Hyo-jung is insecure about her appearance. She joined the yoga academy wishing to restore beauty, yet strange things begin to unfold...

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Last 49 Days
programme.desc: The three grim reapers will guide their 49th soul Kim Soo-Hong to the underworld trials. Meanwhile, God of House will recover the grim reapers' memories from 1,000 years ago.

programme.title: Hitman: Agent Jun
programme.desc: While under the influence of alcohol, an unsuccessful comic book writer draws a comic about his life as a former NIS hitman, and runs into trouble when it gets posted online.

programme.title: Good Deal
programme.desc: The stories of worn goods that build bridges between people from all walks of life begin with a little boy trying to buy a second-hand baseball jacket from a former baseball player.

programme.title: Secret Zoo
programme.desc: Dreams of landing a permanent position at a top law firm, a lawyer takes on an unusual assignment of keeping an ownerless zoo running by convincing its employees to dress up as animals.

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: A debt collector has liver cancer and has to get a liver transplant in 10 days. A seductive swindler agrees to donate her liver only if he tracks down the man who put her in prison.

programme.title: Cassiopeia
programme.desc: Soo-Jin is a successful lawyer and loving mother who tries to live a fulfilling life after her divorce, but things start to fall apart when she is diagnosed with Alzheimer's after a car accident.

programme.title: Escape From Mogadishu

programme.title: Wu Liang Shrine Ep2
programme.desc: This historical and cultural film takes the "Wu Liang Shrine" as the first batch of key cultural heritage sites in New China. It focuses on the stone carved murals of the "Wu Liang Shrine", which have been of great interest to Chinese scholars since the Song dynasty.Through these intricate stone carvings, the film delves deep into the stories of numerous figures spanning across ancient and modern times. It provides an in-depth exploration of the historical, artistic, and ideological value of the Wu Liang Shrine.

From cities to the countryside, forests to beaches, the audience witnesses unique ways of traveling with pets while discovering animal rescue initiatives for stray animals and fostering harmonious relationships between humans and pets.

programme.title: Talk With Famous Doctors Ep16
programme.desc: The program focuses new research and development of interactive health science popularization plan; from "treatment" to "prevention", increase the in-depth popularization of medical and health knowledge.

programme.title: Tenday Ep13
programme.desc: 39 well-known competitors from a variety of industries, including Nicky Wu, Michelle Chen, Neo Hou, Lin Gengxin, and Shen Yue, are invited to participate in an immersive survival reality TV series. The show involves living in a real metropolis for 10 straight days in a closed-off setting. They will encounter tasks that will put their cooperation, mental, physical, and psychological faculties to the test. The champion will be the ultimate victor.

programme.title: Taste Humanity at Night Season 3 Ep4
programme.desc: This program explores the culinary talents of renowned regional chefs across different Chinese cities: Quanzhou, Yinchuan, Qingdao, Liuzhou, Zigong, Xiangyang, Lhasa, and Kunming. programme.title: Ready To Dance Ep3
programme.desc: The top brand leader has sent their youth dance team to the famous 7th District, the ultimate destination for outstanding dancers, to battle for the last position. The young dancers, led by organizer Zhu Zhengting and special coaches Even Wong and NAME, are continually competing and performing to win a badge for their brand. programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep144
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: iWalker (M) Ep29
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience. Hosts will travel around the world to introduce the hidden gems & delicious local food in each place.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2249
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep145
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4967
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep1018
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2250
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep146
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4968
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: P Storm
programme.desc: Ping reports a case of a rich mans son bribing prison guards to cover up his criminal activities in the prison to the ICAC. ICAC officer Luk goes undercover in prison to conduct his investigation. Despite the risks involved, Luk is determined to complete his mission with the help of his cell mate, Wang.

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: My Kung Fu Sweetheart
programme.desc: Phoenixs (Cecilia Cheung) parents are martial arts superheroes, who hide their true identities while ferreting out evil martial artists. Phoenix gets the go-ahead to train in the misty mountains, where she learns of her all-important romantic destiny...

programme.title: In the Mood for Love
programme.desc: This movie is Wong Kar Wais most acclaimed feature, navigating the subtle love relationship between Chow Mo Wan and Su Li Zhen after both discover their spouses having an affair with each other.

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: Death Notice
programme.desc: A serial killer leaves death notices in a city, stating when, how and who he will murder. Even if the victims report it to the police and receive protection, the killer can still break through and execute them. While the police sets up a special task force in response, they expose an even bigger conspiracy behind.

programme.title: Trending Topic
programme.desc: Chen Miao, an online media editor-in-chief, wrote a popular article which has become a trending topic. This however, led indirectly to a girls suicide. After receiving a help request, she realises that there is more to the story than meets the eye. As public opinion sways on the case, a war to speak up for the weak has begun!

programme.title: Everything Under Control
programme.desc: During a diamond heist, one of the security escorts, Jelly, steals the diamonds and flees. Fellow security escorts, Yau Shing and Penguin, are forced to help the robber track down the diamonds. They stumble onto a remote village along the way, encountering strange villagers and mysterious incidents. Can they finally locate Jelly and the diamonds?

programme.title: Cliff Walkers
programme.desc: The first spy thriller movie by famous Director Zhang Yi Mou, this film follows four Communist Party special agents who embark on a secret operation in the Japanese puppet state of Manchukuo in 1932. Sold out by a traitor, the agents, who split up into two teams, find themselves surrounded by threats on all sides. Can they complete their mission?

programme.title: Flirting Scholar 2
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Tang Bo Hu and his three buddies before they become the four great talents in Jiangnan. Tang Bo Hu encounters a beautiful girl when studying in a monastery and they quickly fall in love, but her hidden identity is accidentally unveiled when Tang and friends uncover a conspiracy at the monastery.

programme.title: Only Cloud Knows
programme.desc: This romantic drama is based on the story of a real-life couple. It follows a grieving husband as he journeys to places of significance to his beloved dead wife across their New Zealand homeland.

programme.title: Turns We Take
programme.desc: A spicy hot pot restaurant in Northeast China serves different types of customers every day. Amongst them are a sweet young couple, two wayward young men and a taxi driver. Despite being complete strangers to each other, their lives are intertwined by a traffic accident

programme.title: Ready O/R Knot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi have been together for five years since they first met in a wedding banquet, but marriage soon becomes a challenge to their relationship. Heidi sees marriage as a testimony of their love, while Guy sees it as doomsday. Can the couple resolve their conflict? Are they ready or not?

programme.title: L Storm
programme.desc: ICAC officer Luk and Chief Inspector Lau both hit a dead end when investigating their respective bribery and money laundering cases. When Luk is accused of bribery after being framed by the money launderers, he risks everything he has to find crucial evidence against them to clear his name.

programme.title: Moscow Mission
programme.desc: Based on the 1993 true event of the "China-Russia Train Robbery", a gang of criminals commits a heist, stealing cash and goods from the cross border train. A Chinese police officer disguises as a businessman takes charge of the operation to arrest the criminals, but uncovers a bigger conspiracy instead

programme.title: One More Chance
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as a down-on-his-luck gambler, Water, whose ex-girlfriend asked him to take care of their autistic son. As Water lives with his son, he soon finds his goal in life. When he discovers his sons talent in running, Water decides to give up his dissipated life and support his son to achieve his dream.

programme.title: Seobok
programme.desc: Former secret agent Ki Hun is entrusted with a secret mission to escort the first human clone, Seobok, to a safe place. Seobok, who possesses a life-preserving DNA that could save humanity, explores the outside world with Ki Hun for the first time but they are both chased and claimed as terrorists by CIA. How can Ki Hun protect Seobok from danger?

programme.title: American Dreams in China
programme.desc: During the economic reform period in the 80s, three undergraduates are brought together by a common ambition to live the American dream.

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair
programme.desc: Based on the 1954 martial arts novel by acclaimed author Liang Yu-sang, this film details the tragic romance between wild swordsman Zhuo Yi-hang and rival cult assassin Lien Ni-chang, with a dark, erotic and visually stunning twist.

programme.title: Bounty Hunters
programme.desc: A group of bounty hunters, including San, Yo, Cat, Swan and Bobo, are tasked to track down the culprit of a series of bombings that have plagued an international hotel group. Unfortunately, Swan, Cat and Bobo are kidnapped by the mastermind of the bombings. Can San and Yo save them? Will the bounty hunters accomplish their mission?

programme.title: We are Family
programme.desc: Struggling as an extra, Chi Kwong joins a rent-a-family company run by Carlos and aspiring actress Catherine, and rent themselves out as make-believe relatives. As they surrogate different families, they unravel the complexities of family relationships, forging deeper connections along the way.

programme.title: Love For All Seasons
programme.desc: May, acting leader of the Er Mei sect, cures the incurable illness of Tiger, a rich playboy. Under the threat of her senior, May seeks help from Tiger to experience heartbreak and master the "Heartbroken Sword" style, so as to defeat her senior and preserve Er Mei sect. Will this strange and long-winding relationship reach a happy ending?

programme.title: The Comeback
programme.desc: Uncle Hua is a retired agent who owns an antique shop on an old street. When the old street is forcibly demolished by the local Green Dragon Gang one day, Uncle Huas hidden identity is accidentally revealed, and he is pursued by a mysterious organization headed by Ah Jie. A fatal duel has just begun!

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: A girl named Suki fulfills her dream of being a bus driver after breaking up with her boyfriend, who has an affair with her good friend. When Suki is invited to attend her ex-boyfriends wedding, she is presented with a chance for revenge will she take it and turn her life around?

programme.title: The Monkey King 3
programme.desc: Monkey King, Pigsy and Sandy escort Monk Tang to retrieve the scriptures and accidentally head into the mysterious Female Kingdom. The Queen falls in love with Monk Tang at first sight, but her advisor orders Monk Tang and his disciples to be executed. As the four attract the appearance of River Spirit, the Female Kingdom is plunged into crisis!

programme.title: A Lifetime Treasure
programme.desc: A peaceful home for the elderly is under attack when a gangster and his cronies attempt to set up traps to take over the home! Little did they know that the five elderlies residing in the home have amazing talents to take them head on.

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: I Fine… Thank You… Love You
programme.desc: Pleng, an English tutor, helps her student to pass a break up message in English to her boyfriend Gym. Gym knows nothing about English but wants to win back his girlfriend from the US, so he asks Pleng to teach him. Boorish and a slow learner, Gym makes many hilarious mistakes when learning English and ends up falling for Pleng.

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: Hackers have caused a large-scale cyber attack, but luckily cyber security engineer Chun, manages to fend it off with his protective firewall system. To Chun's surprise, his boss is the mastermind of the attack, and when Chun gets trapped in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: A newly engaged Hong Kong woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander that she was paid for years ago, before she can get married for real. Winner of Best Original Film Score and Best New Director at the 39th Hong Kong Film Awards.

programme.title: P Storm
programme.desc: Ping reports a case of a rich mans son bribing prison guards to cover up his criminal activities in the prison to the ICAC. ICAC officer Luk goes undercover in prison to conduct his investigation. Despite the risks involved, Luk is determined to complete his mission with the help of his cell mate, Wang.

programme.title: The Comedy Of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sisters wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: Executioners From Shaolin
programme.desc: The White-Browed Priest supports the brutal Qing government, burning down Shaolin Temple and hunting its disciples. Hung from Shaolin falls in love with Fang while escaping from the hunt and the couple have a son before Hung is killed by the Priest. To avenge his father, Hung creates a new form of martial art combining his parents kung fu styles.

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Yang Lin is a righteous hero who helps an unjustly imprisoned swordsman accused of stealing. They break out of prison together, and warn all evil men they know to watch out for a new deadly duo in town.

programme.title: Fangs Of The Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: Mad Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Master Chen was an esteemed Monkey Kung Fu master, until he is framed and crippled by a ruthless villain and ends up becoming a wandering artiste. When Chen meets a young man, Little Monkey, on the streets, he decides to teach him all his monkey kung fu moves. Both men eventually team up to avenge Chens past insult.

programme.title: The Tiger And The Widow
programme.desc: The Liu Chia-liang trained Hui Ying-hung was considered the top action martial arts female star in the 1980s. It is her martial arts abilities that Michelle Yeoh tries to emulate. In The Tiger and the Widow, Hui Ying-hung is somehow mixed up in a salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and rotten dilemmas.

programme.title: Portrait In Crystal
programme.desc: Tragic deaths in the underworld cause leader "Yama" (Teng Wei-hao) to suspect a portrait in crystal with mysterious powers. He sends Hen Pan (Chen Hung) and Pai Pan (Hung Hsin-nan) to interrogate its creator, martial artist Lung Fei (Pai Piao)...

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: The Singing Killer
programme.desc: Chiang Yi is blackmailed into a jewelry heist by his former boss, who threatens to expose his shady past. Complications arise when he discovers his first love works at the store.

programme.title: Forbidden Tales Of Two Cities
programme.desc: Li Han-hsiang wrote and directed this charming and fascinating comedy, Forbidden Tales Of Two Cities. The two cities in the picture are Macau, where a love quartet is a morally-unsound source for sexual entertainment; and Hong Kong, where a woman enters a gamblers apartment to find four shackles hanging from his ceiling to aid in kinky activities.

programme.title: Martial Club
programme.desc: The young Wong Fei Hung and his friend Wang Yin Lin offend the young master of another rival school and the expert they hire, causing both martial arts schools to fight against each other. This is Director Liu Chia Liangs masterpiece and one of the top ten highest grossing movies in 1981.

programme.title: Gambler'S Delight
programme.desc: The Killer star Danny Lee plays the lead role of a guy who needs to become a hero. He lies, steals and cheats his way into operating a plush casino, but when he incurs the wrath of a female Japanese gang leader, all bets are off!

programme.title: Sunset
programme.desc: Teenage heart-throbs Ching Li and Paul Chin Pei come across like Annette Funicello and Frankie Avalon in the musical Sunset, a musical romp that plays similar to one of Hollywood's famous "Beach Party" movies. A car load of girls meets a car load of boys, and Ching and Paul ultimately fall in love. Yet the film takes an acrid twist and turns out to be more like a Shakespearian tragedy than a beach-babe party.

programme.title: The Shaolin Avengers
programme.desc: Hu seeks to avenge his father who is being killed by the White-Browed Hermit and his gang. However, he fails in his attempt and is saved by Fang Shi Yu, a youth from Shaolin whose parents are also killed by the same villains. They learn and master the advanced Shaolin style kung fu, before Fang leads Hu and the Shaolin fellows to fight the enemies.

programme.title: My Name Ain'T Suzie
programme.desc: Young Mei Li works as a bar girl in Wanchai to make a living. When she meets Jimmy in the bar, she thinks he is her true love and falls crazily in love with him. When Jimmy has to leave, Mei Li is devastated. It is not until she encounters the triad boss Ying that she finally found someone to count on.

programme.title: The Flying Dagger
programme.desc: The Yu family and the Green Dragon clan became enemies when the Yu daughter killed the clan heads son, who was a rapist and murderer. The Green Dragon leader wounds the head of the Yu family with his flying daggers, and a wandering swordsman saves the family using his own flying dagger skills. However, his allegiances and motives are unclear.

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demons clutches.

programme.title: The Singing Thief
programme.desc: A master jewel thief turns over a new leaf as a professional singer in a nightclub. However, a series of robberies happened shortly after and he becomes the suspect again. The thief then sets up a trap to snare the copycat but will this backfire on him?

programme.title: The Blue And The Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return

programme.title: Wits Of The Brats
programme.desc: Tou Kuan is a wealthy Kwangtung brat with a good kung fu background, he has only one ambition: to pit his wits against three shady masters of the North. The first, conman Che Tsai. The second, a professional romantic dubbed The Terrific. Terrific introduces Tou Kuan to his third rival, Thief Shih San-shou.

programme.title: Facets Of Love
programme.desc: Set in the Ming Dynasty, the story revolves around a brothel and the girls who work there. The film begins by following the life of a girl from a poor family, who is sold by her mother to the brothel. While she is the most beautiful of the girls and attracts many clients, the girl hopes to escape this sad way of life one day.

programme.title: Rolls, Rolls, I Love You
programme.desc: Three young men offend a billionaire and are drawn into a high stakes bet. If they win, they get to keep the billionaires Rolls Royce. Otherwise, they will need to pay the rich man fifty thousand dollars! Will the underdogs win the bet?

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: The Duel
programme.desc: After knowing his brother has killed the head of a rival triad, Jie takes the blame and was hunted by killers. With the help of Rambler Nan, Jie finally killed his enemies, but then found out that Nan is the one who has killed his father.

programme.title: Five Elements Ninjas
programme.desc: The film is about a Chinese martial arts school finds itself outclassed by their rivals, they hire elite ninja from Japan to destroy the school. The lone survivor of the massacre learns the secrets of ninjutsu and seeks revenge against the ninja.

programme.title: Whose Baby Is In The Classroom?
programme.desc: Chen, a male teacher in an all girls high school, is stuck with a baby that isnt his and must take care of it. As he lives on the school grounds, the baby is a source of constant distraction and worry! Luckily, his class warms to the baby and helps him take care of it while he works his charm on Li Ching, an uptight teacher in the same school.

programme.title: Clan Feuds
programme.desc: Like legendary director Chu Yuan did so often and so successfully, Chang Peng Yi adapted this film from a story by Ku Lung. Following the footsteps of the equally legendary Chang Cheh, Chang also casted the majestic Ti Lung, along with "Venoms Lo Meng and Sun Chien, for a spectacular showcase of mystical Martial Arts Worlds intrigue and consummate Kung Fu.

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her familys objection, so Hongs maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: Judgement Of An Assassin
programme.desc: An evil clan plans a discord so as to dominate the martial arts world. Their masked assassins massacre another clan and one of the assassins is arrested and brought to trial at a tribunal of all the clans. What judgement will they make and can they uncover the truth?

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperors death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: Twin Blades Of Doom
programme.desc: A retired martial artist is forced to return with a vengeance after his family and friends are murdered by the evil Ghost Gang. He decides to challenge the gangs leader to a deadly duel so as to take revenge. Can he defeat the ruthless leader in the end?

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: Crazy Nuts Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: A roadside bandit and a traveling gambler team up to make money from gambling. In a successful attempt to steal a huge amount of money from a warlords home, they encounter revolutionists who seek their help to fund the reform campaign. Will the two help the revolutionists cause with the stolen money?

programme.title: Hagola Ep54
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Hagola Ep55
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Hagola Ep56
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Hagola Ep57
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Hagola Ep58
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Hagola Ep60

programme.title: The Man From U.N.C.L.E.
programme.desc: Set against the backdrop of the early 1960s, at the height of the Cold War, THE MAN FROM U.N.C.L.E. centers on CIA agent Solo (Man of Steel's Henry Cavill) and KGB agent Kuryakin (The Social Network's Armie Hammer). Forced to put aside longstanding hostilities, the two team up on a joint mission to stop a mysterious international criminal organization, which is bent on destabilizing the fragile balance of power through the proliferation of nuclear weapons and technology. The duo's only lead is the daughter of a vanished German scientist, who is the key to infiltrating the criminal organization, and they must race against time to find him and prevent a worldwide catastrophe.

programme.desc: When a kingpin threatens New York City, a news reporter find a quad of mutants which makes an alliance to unravel Shredder's plan as the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out Of The Shadows
programme.desc: Now the brothers must team up with April O'Neil and their new ally Casey Jones, to battle their enemies and face their biggest threat: the notorious Krang.

programme.title: Wolf
programme.desc: A mild-mannered book editor (Jack Nicholson) bitten by a wolf goes for the throat of all who have betrayed him. Michelle Pfeiffer co-stars.

Academy Award Winner Kevin Spacey and young Hollywood super star Kate Boswoth star in this clever & adreniline filled heist film. An MIT math whiz is recruited by a teacher to join a specialized team of card counters.

programme.title: Attack Force
programme.desc: When aliens arrive on Earth to harvest human DNA, a special agent is assigned to destroy them without letting the public know they exist.

programme.title: Nanny's Killer Scandal
programme.desc: Jamie Kassman takes on a temporary job as a nanny for her idol, multimillionnaire Walter Page. Things start off great but when his advances get rejected, his intentions quickly go from inappropriate to deadly.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: Life is a sci-fi thriller about an International Space crew whose mission turns to one of primal fear after discovering a terrifying life form.

programme.title: Elysium
programme.desc: In the year 2154, two classes of people exist: the very wealthy, who live on a pristine man-made space station called Elysium, and the rest, who live on an overpopulated, ruined Earth.

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: A crash landing leaves teenager Kitai Raige (Jaden Smith) and his legendary father Cypher (Will Smith) stranded on Earth, 1,000 years after cataclysmic events forced humanitys escape.

programme.title: Cloudy With A Chance Of Meatballs 2
programme.desc: Flint Lockwood learns that his food making invention survived and is now combining food and animals to create "foodimals!" Flint and his friends embark on an adventurously mouth-watering mission to save the world again!

programme.title: Fast Five
programme.desc: Hunted by a ruthless agent and an army of corrupt cops working for a deadly drug kingpin, Toretto and OConner reunite the gang to pull off one last job - an insane heist worth $100 million!

programme.title: Fast & Furious 6
programme.desc: When a Russian Military Convoy is taken down in Moscow, Agent Hobbs goes to the only man who can help him find his target Dominic Toretto.

programme.title: Portillo's Andalucia S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Sevilla and Carmona - Michael finishes his Andalucian odyssey in the capital Sevilla and Carmona.

programme.title: Planet Earth S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Caves - Caves contain some of the most dramatic and unusual phenomena in nature, including birds' nests made from saliva and fish that cling to walls.

programme.title: Seven Worlds, One Planet S1 Ep6
programme.desc: North America - The latest series from the BBC and Sir David Attenborough explores North America - a land of change where pioneering animals make the most of surprising opportunities.

programme.title: Croc Watch with Steve Backshall S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Steve tries to find out if monster crocodiles can still thrive in the Reserve, and encounters five-metre-long Henry. But will he finally find the monster croc he's been searching for?

programme.title: Portillo's Andalucia S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Sevilla and Carmona - Michael finishes his Andalucian odyssey in the capital Sevilla and Carmona.

programme.desc: Ben Stiller - World-renowned survivalistBear Gryllsmeets actorBen Stilleron the rugged mountains of the Isle of Skye in Northern Scotland, to go on a once in a lifetime adventure.

programme.desc: Defending Wild Dogs - The people going to extraordinary lengths to understand and protect canids, from preventing wild dogs dying of grief in South Africa to protecting the tiny Darwin's fox.

programme.desc: Ruby Wax, Mel B and Emily Atack travel off-road through Utah and trek the mountains of Aspen as they investigate the meaning of the American Dream.

programme.title: How Did They Build That? S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Discover how engineers built Zaha Hadid's Antwerp Port House, find out how 432 Park Avenue New York was built and marvel at Kengo Kuma's Victoria & Albert Museum in Dundee, Scotland.

programme.desc: Drew Brees - Bear Grylls ventures deep into Panama's Camino de Cruces jungle with Super Bowl winning quarterback Drew Brees, exploring caves and wrestling a six-foot crocodile.

programme.desc: Witness some of the planets most dramatic natural shifts in July, from the Arctic ice sheets that come crashing down during the summer melt to the feeding frenzy when sockeye salmon reach the end of their journey in Alaska.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 3 - Back to School Ep1
programme.desc: Start a promising new term at the Orangutan Jungle School in Borneo. See newbie Bumi struggle to focus, track skittish Rumbas first timid steps toward independence, and cheer on star student Valentino as he experiences a bumpy start to college.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 3 - Class Reunion Ep2
programme.desc: Follow new graduate Beni, who gets an exciting introduction to jungle college alongside former classmates Sura, Meryl, and Wine. Check on new arrival Molly and join Dr. Nadine as she grades slowpoke Bumi and wild child Monita on their latest lessons.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway 1 - Into the Darkness Ep3
programme.desc: Stay up late as the northern team attaches an activity tag to a bull shark and finds out what this night owl does after sunset. Then dive 80 meters deep with the southern team, who are hoping to put a satellite tracker on a female great white.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 - Battle Lines Ep1
programme.desc: As the dry season approaches, tensions rise on Lemur Island, both between rival gangs and within their own ranks. Get a view from the battlefield as the female leaders fiercely defend their turf, while their newborn infants cling to them for safety.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 - Under Pressure Ep2
programme.desc: As food and water become scarce, Crystal, the fierce leader of the Ruins gang, sets her sights on rival Katis territory and its neighboring fruit trees. Watch as Crystals move and a raid by outside invaders lead to dire consequences for one troop.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Bound By Blood Ep1
programme.desc: Experience unbelievable acts of courage and loyalty by creatures trying to survive in the remote wilderness of New Zealands South Island. Face forest penguins feast and famine cycles, and explore the tumultuous world of newborn sea lions.

programme.desc: Circle the equator for a look at the diverse species that dwell in tropical forests. Meet a lone sloth growing a mini-forest, lemurs that share and share alike, and elephants that tend to their woodland gardens. Then explore the regions dark side.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia 1 - Tropical Shores Ep1
programme.desc: Explore the shores of the Northern Territory and the abundant waters of the Great Barrier Reef. Face flooded roads, hungry saltwater crocs, and killer jellyfish as Lizzie investigates why so many strange, deadly creatures make this remote area home.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Life in Dark Water Ep2
programme.desc: Learn how winters arrival triggers animal survival instincts in southwestern New Zealand. Track dolphins as they move to warmer waters to give their calves a fighting chance, and join longfin eels on an epic migration to their spawning grounds.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - September-October - a Time of Activation Ep5
programme.desc: Travel around the world to see another seasonal change unfold. The Northern Hemisphere moves into autumn, while Australia witnesses a rebirth of life, and mating humpbacks fill the warming tropical seas of Tonga.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Human Influenced Ep2
programme.desc: In geological and biological scales, humans have only been around for the blink of an eye, and yet weve managed to influence the evolutionary path for many animals. Explore the human impact on dogs, wolves, coyotes, elephants, and more.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Choices Ep3
programme.desc: Learn how Ningaloos conservation miracle could inspire humans to pull the planet back from the brink of climatic destruction. Visit an abandoned whaling station and other ruins that show we have the tools, if only we can find the will to change.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 - Tropical Ep1
programme.desc: Circle the equator for a look at the diverse species that dwell in tropical forests. Meet a lone sloth growing a mini-forest, lemurs that share and share alike, and elephants that tend to their woodland gardens. Then explore the regions dark side.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia 1 - The Cool South Ep2
programme.desc: Say goodbye to the tropics and dip into cool southern-coast waters. Come face to face with majestic grey nurse sharks, shape-shifting cuttlefish, and huge blue whales; play with penguins and sea lions; and learn why these seas are brimming with life.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Autumn Ep3
programme.desc: As fall sweeps across America and trees are set ablaze with color, animals are faced with make-or-break decisions. Find out how bald eagles, beavers, and other creatures prepare for the colder, darker, and leaner months ahead.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Winter Ep4
programme.desc: Winter is the ultimate challenge for wildlife across America. Will they escape to milder southern climates or stay put and tough out the season? See how different creatures respond to the brutal cold and blizzards that blanket the North.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Age of Independence Ep3
programme.desc: The south-eastern coast of New Zealand are some of the richest fishing grounds in the world the place for young marine animals to transition from novices to independent adults. Young whales, dolphins and seals learn to hunt, learn the rules of society, or strike out on their own adventures.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - November-December - Full Circle Ep6
programme.desc: Witness some of the most incredible natural events in November, from the millions of Monarch butterflies that converge in Mexicos forests to the deep fog that shrouds the city of Dubai, signalling the start of winter.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Choices Ep3

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ultimate Predator Ep1

programme.title: Jamie's One-Pan Wonders S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Jamie cooks a tasty aubergine burger, the quickest sesame-seared salmon supper, and chickpea and squash casserole that you can turn into a whole host of delicious dishes.

programme.title: Grand Designs S21 Ep8
programme.desc: Billingshurst Revisit 2023 - Every Grand Designs project has its challenges, and the triangle house in Billingshurst, West Sussex, certainly had its fair share. It saw one of the trickiest plots ever seen on the show.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Cornish king crab is on the menu for Rick as he heads out of Newquay to catch and cook this tasty crustacean. Afterwards, he takes a trip inland to Bodmin Moor to meet Robin Hanbury Tenison, one of the 20th century's last great explorers. His farm is home to one of Cornwall's most ambitious rewilding projects, where Robin's son, Merlin, has recently introduced a pair of wild beavers who are doing their best to restore biodiversity in this corner of Cornwall.

programme.title: Paul Hollywood Eats Japan S1 Ep1

programme.desc: Hotel Hubertus, Italy - Christmas Special - In the Alpine Tyrol region of Northern Italy lies Hotel Hubertus - a family run resort which offers spectacular views of the surrounding mountains thanks to its extraordinary architecture. Rob and Monica discover the unique Heaven and Hell spa, local ski experiences and are welcomed into the family behind the vision.

programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2020
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and take a short trip back to 2020!

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep2
programme.desc: The Sleepover Save / The Very Hungry Vacuum - Marcus is having his first sleepover and Phoebe is concerned that Marcus may be nervous so Phoebe sets out to make sure he has the best first sleepover ever. / When Athenas magical jump rope gets sucked up by the familys new robot vacuum, she loses confidence in her abilities, only to learn that her real abilities are already inside her.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep20
programme.desc: Family Trip / Great Great Grandicorn - Kelp and Scallop help Dad discover the true meaning of family trips. / When the Great Great Grandicorn comes to visit, the kids learn that making mistakes is part of learning.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep1
programme.desc: Ty And Revvit - Meet Ty Rux and his buddy Revvit as they join forces with the giant Dinotrux team that are half dinosaur, half construction truck and full-on fun!

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep2
programme.desc: Scrapadactyls - When Revvit and his Reptool friends venture out of their ravine, the Dinotrux band together to save them from a flock of savage Scrapadactyls.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Frenzied Farts of Flabby Flabulous - George and Harold create a comic book about their gym teacher, but after a freak accident turns fantasy into reality, the best friends must run from his revenge

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep2
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Dreadful Debacle of DJ Drowsy Drawers - George and Harold attempt to save the fun at their school dance, but matters are made worse when their music teachers transforms into the dull yet deadly villain DJ Drowsy Drawers

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep20
programme.desc: Family Trip / Great Great Grandicorn - Kelp and Scallop help Dad discover the true meaning of family trips. / When the Great Great Grandicorn comes to visit, the kids learn that making mistakes is part of learning.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep1
programme.desc: The Cleat without Feet / Real Magic - When Phoebe accidentally knocks Harper's soccer cleat off the balcony before the big game, the Dew Drops must venture into the city to retrieve the cleat. / When Dylan starts practicing magic tricks, Athena thinks his magic is real! But when the Dew Drops investigate his magic hat, they accidentally break it and must fix it before Dylans magic show for the neighborhood kids.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep1
programme.desc: Booving In / Sant Oh - Best friends Tip and Oh drive each other crazy when he moves into the human world with her./Oh stirs up trouble when he tries to act like Santa Claus.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep2
programme.desc: Little Kisses / Snow Day - Tip busts Oh eating kitty litter and says he'll never get kissed by My Mom again./Oh and Tip help out all his friends when they freeze into Boovsicles.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep1
programme.desc: Lucky And The Unbreakable Spirit - A wild horse Spirit and a soontobe city girl Lucky become friends in a frontier town

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep2
programme.desc: Lucky And The Treacherous Trail - When Lucky gets wind of an advanced trail ride she decides to become the best frontier girl anyone has ever seen.overnight

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep3
programme.desc: Lucky And The Mysterious Map - During a camping trip Jim gives Lucky and the girls a treasure map that sends them on the adventure of a lifetime

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep63
programme.desc: Untitled Templeton Project - Fired from Baby Corp and trying to build their own business, Boss Baby and Tina waste all their startup funds immediately, requiring a loan from Banker Baby Benny. In order to receive their seed money and get their company rolling, they have to rebuild the towns faith in a baby who made everyone miss a huge sporting even (and they have to do it on a very limited budget)

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep64
programme.desc: Puppy Love - Unable to land baby clients, Boss and Tina take in a naughty little puppy as a side hustle, trying to earn a little extra scrap. But once they discover the dogs in the neighborhood are stealing for a puppy trainer named Becker, the mission gets much bigger, and our team is forced to earn a little Puppy Love for once.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep65
programme.desc: Biscuits Rising - Lured into an empty hotel where a baby has supposedly gone missing, the team is trapped by Crispin Biscuits, a chaotic British schoolboy baby whos been hired to wreck Boss and Tinas lives. Crispin puts the new companys loyalty to a test in a series of fiendish puzzling mind games, all with the threat of constant balloon popping (horrible for baby ears!)

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep1
programme.desc: A Cause for The Paws - Po, at the top of his game but lonely, comes across two weasels stealing an earthquake causing gauntlet and tries to stop them, but inadvertently destroys a town. He loses his title as Dragon Master and teams up with Wandering Blade, a knight on a mission from England, to track down the weasels and get his title back.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep2
programme.desc: The Knights Code - Po and Blade's personalities clash as they track Klaus and Veruca and fight off some of Po's old foes. Blade gets to see Po's kung fu mastery, but doesn't agree to team up with him until she realizes that he accidentally holds the key to finding Klaus and Veruca: he has a piece of the WuGao Gauntlet. Meanwhile, Klaus and Veruca continue on their path of destruction while looking for the mysterious "Lotus".

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep3
programme.desc: The Lotus - Po's moral lines are blurred when he and Blade have to break an untrustworthy hedgehog monk (Zhen) out of jail to get more information on what Klaus and Veruca stole from the Lotus. They learn from Zhen that there are in fact three more weapons, and Po recognizes one of them from a comic book.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep53
programme.desc: Living On The Edge - With their enemies defeated and the volcano erupting on Dragon's Edge, the riders decide to return to Berk but Hiccup discovers that the Dragon Hunters are still out there

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep54
programme.desc: Sandbusted - When Hiccup is summoned to the Northern Markets to look into a curse that causes people to disappear, he is sucked down into a cavern of the fearsome Sandbuster

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep55
programme.desc: Something Rotten On Beserker Island - When the riders receive an invitation to Berserker Island for Gustav's apprenticeship graduation, they arrive to find Savage trying to take over Dagur's throne

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep1
programme.desc: The Perfect Show/ Napoleon - Peabody & Sherman's first show goes off the rails when celebrity-seeking neighbors won't leave; Napoleon throws a temper tantrum to get his own dessert.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep1
programme.desc: The New Alliance - A space explorer, previously thought lost in space, returns to Earth and joins four teenagers in a search for a giant alien robot lion

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep1
programme.desc: Wednesday - Just before her 15th Birthday. Princess Cleopatra is zapped thirty thousand years into the future where she discovers that she is the prophesied savior of the galaxy.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep1
programme.desc: Crazy Fast - Turbo must become a hero by saving the city from a menacing tiger beetle, who has challenged him to a race on an insane stunt-filled obstacle course.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep1
programme.desc: Ty And Revvit - Meet Ty Rux and his buddy Revvit as they join forces with the giant Dinotrux team that are half dinosaur, half construction truck and full-on fun!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep53
programme.desc: Compost Chaos - Primrose can't make her garden grow and turns to Fifi for advice. She is amazed when Fifi points out that you need to water and weed a garden. And surely she can't really mean putting that yucky compost everywhere can she?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep1
programme.desc: Case Of The Broken Crystal Memory Game - All the toys are ready to start the exciting DareDale Challenge race, which culminates in the competitors successfully completing the Crystal Memory Game in the DareDale Caves. Before the race can start everyone is disappointed to discover that the Crystal Memory Game has been broken. Whilst Clockwork Mouse gets the game mended, Noddy must investigate who broke the game so that they don't break it again. Using his investigating skills in questioning, gathering evidence on the WhoWhatWhere Tablet and thinking, Noddy discovers that Deltoid accidentally broke the game when he was trying to memorise the crystal sorting sequence. Clever Noddy helps Deltoid remember the sequence by remembering the shapes and they are able to finish the game together. Case Closed!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep1
programme.desc: Flash The Marshall - Mr Carburettor is going to ban Flash from Silver hatch unless he learns how to do something useful. Can Flash learn how to be a good marshal in time?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep2
programme.desc: Hellie's A Winner - Hellie wants to be able to race like the cars. When he does join in he is accused of cheating. Hellie is upset and the cars annoyed will they be able to make up before something disastrous happens?

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep1
programme.desc: Little Trouble in Big China - It's the Lunar New Year and Odlulu has accidentally brought a stone dragon to life! Wally and Wenda work with local siblings Li and Liu, members of a dragon dance team, to tame the dragon and keep the celebration from being ruined.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep4
programme.desc: Where There's Smoke - After Magnus accuses Cutter of setting fires near the village that could hurt the sheep, the Riders have to put them out and find the real culprit.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep21
programme.desc: She Said, She Said / Starfish - When one of Rikkis plants won't sing, Pixie and Juniper both tell their varying recollections of why the plant is suddenly silent. / Kelp, Scallop, and Cruz have always thought that starfish did nothing but laze about; but as they go about their day, the starfish goes through his own routine, completely unbeknownst to everyone else.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep2
programme.desc: Sphinx - Puss accidentally gives the orphans a magic substance that will ultimately make them explode. The only cure is guarded by a Sphinx who challenges Puss with riddles - and contrary to his own belief, Puss is not good at riddles.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep5
programme.desc: Heavy Metal - The Rescue Riders get stuck in a cave with their rival, Magnus, during a race to find a new source of an important mineral.

programme.desc: The Banana Bread Burglar / Finding Meow Meow - When the banana bread Harper leaves out for Eden is stolen, the Dew Drops create a sting operation to catch the thief. / When Captain Meow Meow gets a splinter in his paw and hears the word "vet," he flees. programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep2
programme.desc: Dark Park Bark Lark \ The Fast and the Curious - Tag and Scooch team up to get all of Scooch's chores done in time for the Barkapellas Bark In the Park In the Dark concert. \ Tag is so excited to join the Sam Whippets Race Cadets. But when Tag and Scooch show up at the racetrack, theres lots of competition. And to complete the first challenge - a pedal car race - theyre going to have to work together.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep4
programme.desc: Lucky And The Competition Conundrum - When Lucky and Pru find themselves on opposing teams for a school fundraiser their competitive streaks emerge and their friendship is tested

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep5
programme.desc: Lucky And The Appaloosa Adventure - Lucky Spirit and Turo team up to help save an abused horse

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep6
programme.desc: Lucky And The Not-So-Secret Surprise - Lucky enlists Abigail Turo Snips and their horses to help plan a surprise birthday party for Pru that goes disastrously wrong

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep66
programme.desc: Moon Shot - Our teams startup company and their rivals at Baby Corp get in a Space Race, competing to see who can make the cutest kiddie-pretend moon landing for a baby a spectacle sure to bring in a bounty of Baby Love. With both companies pouring their resources into a simulated space take off, tempers and sabotage are running hot, and the scrappy little startup is in danger of getting crushed by their big business competitor.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep67
programme.desc: Inner Children - JJ reluctantly lets Tina take over her assistant duties for the day, but a Tina slip-up leads to an outbreak of town adults drinking diluted special formula that makes them all baby-brained. When JJ discovers this, she works with R & D Baby Simmons and Security Baby Katja to antidote the wobbling Adult Babies before Tina can find out and blame herself.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep68
programme.desc: Poompf! - Crispin Biscuits frames Boss and Tinas startup company for exploding baby Iggys favorite stuffed animal, and Tina is forced to the sidelines to avoid any more bad press. As Crispin expands his plan to burst all the plush toys in the neighborhood, Tina discovers she can stop this by breaking open and rewiring a single toy doll. Unfortunately that doll is Baby Corps current head honcho, Pull-String CEO Baby.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep4
programme.desc: The Legend of Master Long-Tooth - Po and Blade must convince a deceased comic book writer's son to give them information about an unreleased comic that may point them toward the next weapon: a whip of fire. However, after the events of 103 Po is now a wanted criminal, so the Emperor's Forbidden Company arrives and captures him. Torn between saving Po and the mission she's sworn to complete, Blade flees and abandons Po.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep5
programme.desc: The Gateway to The Desert - A mysterious figure helps Po escape the guards, so Po makes his way to a desert market, determined to prove Blade wrong for leaving him behind. But when he accidentally stumbles into Klaus and Veruca, he and Blade awkwardly reunite while giving chase, and work through their differences. But the mysterious figure has followed Po and tries to capture them, clearly a new threat to our team.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep6
programme.desc: The Lost City - With a map from the comic book, Po and Blade make the treacherous journey through the desert to the lost city, and once inside they find the guardian of the fire whip, Rukhmini. The mysterious figure, a stag named Colin, forges an uneasy alliance with Klaus and Veruca.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep56
programme.desc: Soutlouts Angels - When Snoutlout crashes on a mysterious island he comes face-to-face with the Wing Maidens and must rely on Astrid, Heather, and Ruffnut to rescue him

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep57
programme.desc: A Matter Of Perspective - The Riders follow the aging Eruptodon to the sacred Dragon Graveyard, but soon find themselves trapped by the fearsome Sentinel dragons who guard the graveyard

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep58
programme.desc: Return Of Thor Bonecrusher - When Thor Bonecrusher is needed to rescue hostages taken by the Bandits, Snoutlout tries to help but accidentally brings to life Thor's evil twin Anti-Thor who sides with the Bandits

programme.desc: Anyone Can Be American - Hundreds of Chinese citizens camp out in the California desert, waiting to be taken into custody by US Border Patrol. Meanwhile, in Ecuador, more of their compariots are following in their footsteps.

programme.title: East Asia Tonight
programme.desc: Spotlight on East Asia, a region steeped in history and now helping to write the future of our world. We'll break down the key stories and explain why they matter.

programme.title: Walk The Line Ep2
programme.desc: Inching Towards America - The Chinese migrants arrive in Necocli, Colombia, and get ready to embark on the most dangerous part of the journey: a long trek through the Darien Gap.

programme.title: Asia Tonight
programme.desc: CNA correspondents bring you the top stories of the day with 'live' reports and interviews to keep you up-to-date on the day's events.

programme.title: On The Pulse Ep2
programme.desc: Host Dinesh Balasingam looks into male infertility, finds out more about a men's telehealth clinic and learns how to use the mirrors in a gym safely.

programme.title: CNA Correspondent Ep27
programme.desc: They're your eyes and ears around the globe. CNAs network of correspondents shines a light on stories from their corners of the world, from groundbreaking events to up-and-coming trends.

programme.title: Singapore Tonight
programme.desc: From business to politics, health to technology, the latest news from Singapore and analysis of the impact.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed Ep1801
programme.desc: British Invasion - Its a British invasion of the world-famous Octagon as the top stars from across the pond show off their incredible skills on UFC Unleashed. Featuring Tom Aspinall, Meatball Molly McCann, and Paddy The Baddy Pimblett.

programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC284MakhachevvsVolkanovski
programme.desc: At UFC 284, featherweight king Alexander Volkanovski sought a new challenge and a second belt by challenging lightweight champion Islam Makhachev. See both athletes train and prepare ahead of their title bout on UFC Main Event.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep701
programme.desc: Marcus McGhee, Fighter Focus: Mike Malott, Front Row: Drew Dober, Day One: Dricus Du Plessis - Marcus McGhee details his journey from a turbulent life - to the bright lights of the UFC. Mike Malott looks back on his many walks to the Octagon as coach before making his mark in the Octagon. We join Drew Dober Front Row as he watched the lightweight contenders battle it out in Austin. And South African sensations Dricus du Plessis takes us back to his UFC debut.

programme.title: SERIE A TOP 10 SAVES
programme.desc: SERIE A TOP 10 SAVES - Ridiculous reflexes from Vicario, Onana & Maignan. 10 of the best saves from the 22/23 Serie A season.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC297StricklandvsDuPlessis
programme.desc: UFC returns to Toronto with two championship bouts. After an impressive victory over Israel Adesanya, Sean Strickland defends his middleweight belt for the first time against South African slugger Dricus Du Plessis. And in the co-main event, Raquel Pennington and Mayra Bueno Silva battle for the vacant women's bantanweight title. All this and more on Ufc Reloaded

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep3
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep26
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1005UsmanvsEdwards2
programme.desc: UFC 278 was headlined by a rematch between long reigning middleweight king Kamaru The Nigerian Nightmare Usman and UFC vet Leon Rocky Edwards. See their fight like never before with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC293AdesanyavsStrickland
programme.desc: After regaining his title with a satisfying knockout of Alex Pereira, UFC middleweight champion Israel Adesanya defends his crown against hungry challenger Sean Strickland, who has won eight of his last ten bouts. Plus, heavyweight knockout artist Tai Tuivasa collides with Alexander Volkov. See all this and much more on UFC Reloaded

programme.title: UFC The Walk Ep401UFC262
programme.desc: Oliveira vs Chandler - In 2021, UFC veteran Charles Oliveira and highly-touted newcomer Michael Chandler competed for the vacant lightweight title. Watch both athletes' journeys to the Octagon and relive Charles' historic come-back performance to claim the belt.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep910AdesanyavsPereira
programme.desc: At UFC 281, dominant middleweight champion Israel Adesanya puts his title on the line against longtime rival, Alex Pereira. See both men train and prepare ahead of their matchup in New Yorks Madison Square Garden.

programme.title: SERIE A TOP 10 CURLING SHOTS
programme.desc: SERIE A TOP 10 CURLING SHOTS - Bend it like Dybala.. and 9 other wicked efforts that make up Serie As top 10 curlers from 22/23.

programme.title: UFC 307: Pereira vs. Rountree Jr.
programme.desc: Prelims - One of UFCs busiest and most dominant champions, Alex Pereira, puts his light heavyweight title on the line against fellow knockout artist Khalil Rountree Jr. at UFC 307. Fresh from knockouts over former champions Jiri Prochazka in July and Jamahal Hill in April, Brazils Poatan is in fearsome form as he prepares to battle Rountree, who brings a five-fight winning streak into the biggest fight of his career. Plus, Raquel Pennington defends her bantamweight crown for the first time against former champion Julianna Pea in the co-main event
